description: Episode number 4 of Series "Life goes to the movies". Examines the impact of television and the courts' decisions to separate film exhibition from production and distribution in Hollywood's film industry during the period up to the seventies. Shows a series of film clips exemplifying the 1950's preoccupation with romantic love themes. Suitable for Upper Secondary School Students.
